title: SERIOUS CHALL ADC LF.SERIOUS.TEAM
body:
hi friends

experienced two season-chall adc lf a serious team to join. hmu if you got any offers.

thanks.

replies.body:
I am making a full diamond team
IGN: Seethingsin

add me if your interested
Hey I'm currenlty looking for an ADC for a team I'm creating, if you see yourself playing with the best OCE has to offer hit me up in game on Swagzilla420 or Skype at appl3.soss
